alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:53PM EDT until June 22 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Lake Kissimmee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saint Cloud, Lake Kissimmee, Holopaw, Harmony and Alligator Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
